alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 11:00AM EDT until April 01 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ottawa County in northwestern Ohio... Seneca County in northwestern Ohio... Wyandot County in northwestern Ohio... Sandusky County in northwestern Ohio... Crawford County in north central Ohio... Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Eastern Hancock County in northwestern Ohio... Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 1145 AM EDT. * At 1059 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lambertville to 6 miles northeast of Forest, moving east at 65 mph. Toledo Express Airport and Allen County Airport gusted to 56 mph with these storms. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Findlay, Bowling Green, Tiffin, Fremont, Fostoria, Bucyrus, Upper Sandusky, Port Clinton, Kelleys Island, Put-In-Bay, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Galion, Bellevue, Clyde, Rossford, Waterville and Northwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Hancock; Lucas; Ottawa; Sandusky; Seneca; Wood; Wyandot
